top_comments.comment: Why don’t you get the perspective of the labourers who have to face the heat head on rather than a snobby influencer who’s always in AC buildings. Plus Kuwait weather isn’t like this all the time,winter has the best weather and night time isn’t that bad.
Mashallah, i want to come back to Kuwait and make the whole place green, god bless you khalty

comments_since_last_sample.body: why not try kudzu and other vine trees to cover the desert. the bare earth reflects the sun heat, the plants absorb it. start it from every home where grey water is available
now think about the asian guys who do construction work over there..,,wat hell they hav to endure daily..,,
How about the constant discrimination in your societies against the immigrants labours? I hope Allah burns the oppressors with their own reserved oil before the oppressed labours.
BBC Producers are smoking  Rocks! Why would you interview a Rich out of touch "influencer" Oh my Dogs feet What????😁  how about the Poor construction 👷 workers .
We are happy with the heat what is all that drama , the AC is everywhere or if u like 2 go out pick the right time for it. hhhhhhhh
